scripts.dev_db__setup: sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.dev_db_drop_setup: sequelize db:drop && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.test_db_setup: sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test && sequelize db:seed:all --env test
scripts.test_db_drop_setup: sequelize db:drop --env test && sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test && sequelize db:seed:all --env test
